text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- San Sebastian court finds evidence against general Enrique Rodriguez Galindo
- British Queen draws up plan to adapt monarchy for 21st century
- Confusion over possible killing of 63 civilians in Algeria
- Tourism rides the crest of a wave
- Mayor of Barcelona Pascual Maragall defends Popular Party's leader in Catalonia, Aleix Vidal-Quadras, for speaking his mind
- Anti-Castro politician Jorge Mas Canosa involved in further business with Telefonica
- Cajamadrid investigates irregularities in debt recovery
- Riofisa will invest eight billion pesetas in commercial park near Madrid
